HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a project that I have been working on in secret for a long time but it has come to my attention that I can't do it alone. I present Tails Studio!

Tails studio is a program I and hopefully others as well to test Characters and even Npc's before they are deployed to a game engine! Currently its still very young and your free to help and use!
